manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: St James of London Cedarwood & Clarysage Shave Cream Formerly known as Founder’s Reserve, this rich shave cream keeps the exclusivity of its all-natural essential oil formula and top-shelf cream blend. Shaving is no longer a task. It’s a calming routine setting your mood for the day – or night – ahead. This blend uses the steam during or after your hot shower for the finest results. Apply a small amount of the cream to your wet shave brush, lather and shave with the grain. For a closer shave, repeat with strokes against the grain. Either way, this magnificent cream keeps your skin in impeccably soft condition.

About St James of London In the fall of 2013 and after a decade-long dormancy, the St James of London brand was acquired by a private owner. It was during this time the now privately-held brand resurrected itself and re-launched in 2014 with new, modern fragrances using the same original formulas from 1953. We continue to make our products in small-batches to insure perfect quality & consistency. Today, St James of London grace the shelves of the world’s best haberdashers, barbershops and resorts and considered to be among the best shaving and fragrance products in the world. We sincerely thank you for supporting a small business and for sharing a passion for healthy skincare, grooming & fragrance products. Cheers!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My new favorite shaving cream
reviews.reviewText: This is my new favorite shaving cream. It lathers easily into a thick foamy cream. The lubrication while shaving and the scent are both top notch. For background, I’ve been wet shaving for over 10 years. I’ve tried many of the English shaving creams, which are all great too. I’ve also used the sandalwood and bourbon scented shaving creams from the popular store that is in many malls here in the US. With the experience of using all those others, I was ready to try something new. The descriptions and other reviews of this one were attractive so I thought, “why not?“ It didn’t disappoint. In addition to everything stated, it comes in a beautiful jar, and a little shaving cream goes along way. This jar looks like it’s going to last quite a while.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The Best of The Lot !
reviews.reviewText: I rate this cream as something special, yet virtually unknown at the review sites (except one) ! Smooth and efficient razor gliding over the face, with good-sized Fendrihan brush. Comfortable feeling on the face afterward. Mild, pleasant aroma. Alternate this with Sir Hare, and you will not need any other.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 12, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Shaving Creamer, ever!
reviews.reviewText: I've tried a lot of different shaving creams and soaps over the years, Crabtree & Evelyn soap, Taylor of Old Bond Street soap, L'Occitane en Provence Cade cream, but this time, one of my favorites, the Cade cream was out of stock and had been for some time, so I went looking for another. I found this St. James of London Cedarwood and Clarysage cream and I'm glad my previous cream was out of stock. I'll stick with this one for as long as I can.One thing I noticed, right away, is how concentrated this shave cream is. A very tiny dab at the end of a wet brush (perhaps a dime size dab if your using your hands instead of a brush) gave me great lasting lather, that also smells great and makes my skin feel good afterwards. I use Thayer's alcohol-free witch hazel as an after shave. I highly recommend this shave cream. Seems the Brits know how to make it best.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 25, 2021
reviews.reviewText: Great item. St. James of London Shave Cream is top quality. Comes in a large glass jar… not a plastic cup like most others. Nice scent. Very happy with my purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is pretty much a top shelf brand
reviews.reviewText: One cannot go wrong with this brand, my only complaint is that the scent is very mild, barely noticeable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice scent but probably not a fast seller
reviews.reviewText: This shaving cream smells great and lathers up great as well. The only downside is that the texture is on the hard side. Fresh shaving cream is light and airy but this is not. I have had this happen before through Amazon when selecting less popular brand or scent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2022
reviews.reviewText: My fave shaving soap/creamSmells amazingLathers awesome in a bowlDoes not dry out quickly when appliedEases shaving

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 21, 2017
reviews.reviewText: I have tried Taylor of Old Bond Street, Cremo, this product, and various commodity shaving creams at the big box retail stores. In my opinion, this product is tied with the Cremo brand for best shaving performance. Fragrance intensity is subtle, tied with Cremo, less than TOBS. I really like the scent of this product, but not everyone is a fan of all things cedar (their loss). I really like the solid feel of the heavyweight glass jar. Probably not the lightest thing to take when traveling, though.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 23, 2022
reviews.reviewText: A great product. Leaves the skin feeling soft and refreshed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on April 4, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Shaving cream very soft with a good lather, razor glides over face very easily giving an excellent close shave.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on September 18, 2020
reviews.reviewText: Fantastic product, great service from Face & Co

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on May 23, 2017
